rules_text:
[i](Spend a different color of mana on each [/i]V[i].)[/i]
Prismatic Elemental is all colors.
When Prismatic Elemental enters the battlefield, if three different colors were spent to cast this spell, scry 2. If four different colors were spent to cast this spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each multicolored creature you control. If five different colors were spent to cast this spell, proliferate.
notes:
If two colors were spent to cast this spell, create a 4/4 Elemental creature token that's all colors.

If three colors were spent to cast this spell,
